package.name: dbus
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xzf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.gz fi
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 2 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc --enable-inotify \ --localstatedir=/var --enable-xml-docs=no --enable-doxygen-docs=no \ --disable-systemd --without-systemdsystemunitdir --with-console-auth-dir=/var/run/console/ \ CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" pump make -j $jobcount CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" else ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc --enable-inotify \ --localstatedir=/var --enable-xml-docs=no --enable-doxygen-docs=no \ --disable-systemd --without-systemdsystemunitdir --with-console-auth-dir=/var/run/console/ make fi
